commit.message:
re PR tree-optimization/17697 (ICE: Statement marked for throw, but doesn't - verify_stmts failed)

	PR tree-optimization/17697

	cfg if needed.

	* g++.dg/opt/pr17697-2.C: New test.
	* g++.dg/opt/pr17697-3.C: New test.
